messages.title: Building a stronger economy and a fairer society.
messages.content: Elizabeth Clark and the Liberal Democrats are creating opportunity for everyone, building a fairer society and a stronger economy.

messages.title: A Record of Delivery. A Promise of More.
messages.content: 2010 - 2015 A RECORD OF DELIVERY. 2015 - 2020 A PROMISE OF MORE.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Cutting Income Tax for 24 million ordinary workers, providing £282m extra for disadvantaged school children, ensuring the biggest ever cash rise in the state pension and giving parents up to £2000 in tax free childcare.
Building a better economy by having the budget deficit, helping businesses create 1.9 million jobs and giving small businesses tax breaks for hiring apprentices.

Creating the opportunity for everyone. In the next Parliament we will balance the budget and cut taxes further for ordinary workers and campaign for more nurses and increased spending for Wales' struggling NHS.

issues.economy: Budget deficit halved, businesses helped to create 1.9 million jobs.
issues.education: £282m extra funding for disadvantaged Welsh school children.
issues.health: Campaign for more nurses and increased funding for the NHS in Wales.
issues.socialWelfare: 24 million workers received £800 tax cut, the biggest ever cash rise in state pension, tax free childcare up to £2000.

leaflet.personalStatement: Elizabeth Clark grew up in Cardiff. She believes in government investment, public services, and fighting against social injustice.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RLXJ-BXJS-XHXJ, 38 The Parade, Cardiff, CF24 3AD.

leaflet.additionalNotes: 3 great reasons to vote for Elizabeth Clark are: 1. Local campaigner: Has fought to protect our open spaces and libraries. 2. Passionate about NHS: Committed to more funding and nurses. 3. Hardworking: Born and bred in Cardiff, Elizabeth cares about our area.
